Title: Total price should reflect the product quantity

Steps.2: Add any item to the Cart
Steps.4: Change the quantity of the product

Expected result: Total price should reflect the quantity of the product

Title: Login functionality verification

Steps.2: Attempt to log in with valid credentials

Expected result: User should be successfully logged in

Title: Search results accuracy

Steps.1: Enter a search query in the search bar
Steps.2: Press the Enter key or click the Search button

Expected result: Search results should be relevant to the query

Title: Dropdown menu functionality

Steps.1: Visit the website's settings or profile section

Expected result: Dropdown menu items should be visible and responsive
